title: starting to get really frustrated about lag
body:
ok, not even joking im starting to get sick and frickin tired of doing this, probably my 6th post about crappy server lag. 
lately ping has been beyond bad, literally hell, im now stuck on 300 ms all the time and theres nothing to do about it.
im currently in possession of top notch wifi, ive tried all the things you suggested and nothing . NOTHING WORKS , LIKE NO ONE SEEMS TO CARE!!
AND ITS NOT JUST ME ! ITS ALMOST HAPPENING TO 70% OF THE POEPLE I KNOW ON OCE AND ITS GETTING REALLY ANNOYING, soz for caps
apologies for my rant, please help
thank you for your concern

replies.body:
>70% OF THE POEPLE I KNOW

inb4 70% of the people you know are all on the same ISP.

I haven't been experiencing any of this lag myself, but it is possible that it's still the server's fault. Things get very strange when it comes to the internet.

What OS are you on and who is your ISP?
Don't worry, I solved the problem by clearing my DNS cache and adding the Google DNS 8.8.8.8, thank anyways

Changing your DNS should not theoretically improve your ping. Changing DNS is only suggested when you actually can't connect to a game.

But, the internet is a strange thing, it is.
